import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {baseUrl} from '../../context' import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Alert from '../../alert' import lodr from '../student/ATB3o.gif' function allTeacher(props) { const [teacher, setteacher] = useState(null) const [confirm, setconfirm] = useState({isOpen:false}) const [dlt, setdlt] = useState(false) const onDelete=id=>{ setconfirm({...confirm, isOpen:false}); setdlt(true) axios.get(baseUrl+'/teacher/teacherDelete/'+id).then((res)=>{ setdlt(false) }) } useEffect(() => { axios.get(baseUrl + '/teacher/allTeacher').then((res) => { setteacher(res.data); }) }, [dlt]) return dlt ? :(
